rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0001
rows.name:
So this is the broken Data Probe.
Please wait a moment while I finish the repairs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0002
rows.name: And that should do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Sorry for the wait.
All set now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Impressive as always, Lin.
That's a big help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0005
rows.name: Thank you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0006
rows.name: However[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0007
rows.name:
I think it would be best to apply a correction patch
to all the probes we've launched so far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0008
rows.name: They might stop working eventually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0009
rows.name: Wh-What-meh!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Go around to every single probe
and do a correction patch-meh!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0011
rows.name: Tatsu will become an old Nopon before you finish, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0012
rows.name:
No, no, that's not it.
I fixed this one manually, but[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0013
rows.name:
The other probes will be fixed just by transferring
the corrected program.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0014
rows.name: Tatsu doesn't really get it, but I'm relieved-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0015
rows.name: There are lots and loooots probes on this planet, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0016
rows.name: Yeah, that's true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0017
rows.name:
We've worked so hard launching
so many probes up until now, haven't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0018
rows.name: Lin-san?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0019
rows.name:
It's not just us.
Lots of teams are continuing the work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0020
rows.name:
But no matter how much FrontierNet expands,
the Central Life still isn't found.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0021
rows.name: Why is that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0023
rows.name:
Maybe the thing we're looking for
isn't even on this planet[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Or maybe...
It broke when it crashed on the surface[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0025
rows.name: That's impossible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0026
rows.name: But![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0027
rows.name:
The consciousness that moves our B.Bs.
isn't inside these bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0028
rows.name: It's in the Central Life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Naturally, that means it's intact and at a distance
where we wouldn't feel any communication lag.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0030
rows.name: You're right[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0030_2
rows.name: I'm sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0031
rows.name:
It's okay. It's natural to be tired.
It's been a long couple of months.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0032
rows.name: Even adults get tired from having to live constantly in a B.B...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0033
rows.name: You're admirable for having endured it this long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0034
rows.name: I wonder what the person who designed the B.B. was thinking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0035
rows.name: Is something wrong-meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0036
rows.name:
These B.B.—why would you make an
artificial body that can cry tears?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0037
rows.name: It's embarrassing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0038
rows.name:
Tears are necessary.
They have the important function of washing things away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0039
rows.name: Like dirt and dust that get in your eyes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0040
rows.name: And the things that build up in your heart, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0041
rows.name:
They're well made, aren't they?
Both human bodies and B.Bs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0042
rows.name:
If you ever meet the designers,
you should thank them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0043
rows.name: Right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs10060100_MSG0044
rows.name: Wh-What's that sound-meh?[ST:wait ]
